name: RewindMaze
description:
Developed in 1 week for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.

Rewind Maze

In this game you are in a maze and have to find your way out of it collecting Vinyl Discs before the Rewind Timer is over and restarts you're position.

You play as a Dj, who in his way to a party gets lost in a maze. By getting lost, he also loses his powerful Vinyl Discs.

The Vinyl Discs have a peculiarity, they stop time from Rewinding, which is a common thing to the Dj due to his short memory(no wonder why he got lost).

Controls

Use the arrows or the WASD keys to move around the maze.

Info

I know the game is kinda short, but this is my first game jam ever! And also, my first "completed" game, so be patient  :)
